code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{onLogin}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/auth/login`,{email,password});onLogin(res.data.userId);}catch(err){alert('Đăng nhập thất bại');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"M\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{textAlign:'right',marginTop:'5px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/forgot-password",style:{fontSize:'14px'},children:"Qu\xEAn m\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u?"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp"})]});}export default Login;
